text: The 2017 Northwest Territories Men's Curling Championship was held from January 19 to 22 at the Yellowknife Curling Centre in Yellowknife. The winning Jamie Koe team will represent the Northwest Territories at the 2017 Tim Hortons Brier in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. ==Teams== The teams are listed as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
